title: Springtime for the Clintons
sub_head: Maybe the Covid panic really is over as the first family of political fundraising accelerates the hunt for donors.
body:
There are a few Covid bitter-enders in politics and public education who are still forcing children to cover their faces, but America continues to open up and resume normal life.
The bitter-enders of course include the union representing teachers in the Los Angeles Unified School District. Howard Blume reported this week in the L.A. Times:
